name: web-development-toolbox-mcp
description: Web development utilities including base64 encoding/decoding, color conversion, datetime operations, QR code generation, JWT decoding, UUID generation, and placeholder image creation
long_description:
Provides tools for:

- **Encoding & Decoding**: Base64 encoding/decoding and JWT token decoding
- **Color Conversion**: Convert between RGB, HSV, and HEX color formats
- **Date & Time**: Convert between Unix timestamps and ISO 8601 formats
- **QR Code Generation**: Create QR codes from text
- **UUID Generation**: Generate UUID v4 and v7 identifiers
- **Image Generation**: Create placeholder images with custom dimensions and colors

tools.name: hex_to_rgb
tools.description: Convert a hex color code to RGB format

tools.name: rgb_to_hex
tools.description: Convert RGB values to a hex color code

tools.name: unix_to_iso
tools.description: Convert a Unix timestamp to ISO 8601 format

tools.name: iso_to_unix
tools.description: Convert an ISO 8601 string to Unix timestamp

tools.name: generate_qr_code
tools.description: Generate a QR code from a given string

tools.name: generate_placeholder_image
tools.description: Generate a placeholder image with specified dimensions
